nodes.speaker: Dr. Two-Factorious
nodes.text: Hi there! I'm Dr. Two-Factorious, guardian of logins everywhere. The Hacker Lord has new tricks—only Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) can stop him. Have you heard of MFA?

nodes.speaker: Hacker Lord
nodes.text: So you think you’re clever, huh? I’ll test you. If someone knows your password, can they get in without MFA?

nodes.speaker: Hacker Lord
nodes.text: Muahaha! Without MFA, your account is mine! Passwords by themselves are too weak!

nodes.speaker: Dr. Two-Factorious
nodes.text: Correct! MFA protects you even if someone gets your password. Let's learn a little more!

nodes.speaker: Dr. Two-Factorious
nodes.text: MFA means you use more than just a password. You prove who you are in a second way—like showing an ID and knowing a secret handshake.

nodes.speaker: Dr. Two-Factorious
nodes.text: There are three main factors: something you know (password), something you have (phone or key), and something you are (fingerprint). Which one do you want to hear about?

nodes.speaker: Dr. Two-Factorious
nodes.text: Passwords are useful, but alone they break as fast as a cookie in a dragon’s mouth. Let’s add more protection!

nodes.speaker: Dr. Two-Factorious
nodes.text: Phones, security keys, and other gadgets! If a thief steals your password, they still need your device to break in.

nodes.speaker: Dr. Two-Factorious
nodes.text: Fingerprints and face scans—your personal features! Those are hard to copy… unless the Hacker Lord starts collecting noses. Ew!

nodes.speaker: Dr. Two-Factorious
nodes.text: You’re trying to protect your treasure chest account. Which MFA method will you pick?

nodes.speaker: Hacker Lord
nodes.text: Tch… SMS codes work, but I can sometimes steal them. Not bad though… I’ll back off… for now!

nodes.speaker: Dr. Two-Factorious
nodes.text: Great choice! Authenticator apps are safer than SMS. Your treasure is well protected!

nodes.speaker: Hacker Lord
nodes.text: NOOO! A hardware key?! I can’t steal that from a distance! You’re too strong!

nodes.speaker: Hacker Lord
nodes.text: No MFA?! I just walked in and took everything. Too easy!

nodes.speaker: Dr. Two-Factorious
nodes.text: You protected your account with MFA—nice work. There’s still room to level up!

nodes.speaker: Dr. Two-Factorious
nodes.text: Your defenses are strong! The Hacker Lord can barely reach you. Stay alert!

nodes.speaker: Dr. Two-Factorious
nodes.text: You are unstoppable! With a hardware key and your smarts, the cyber world cheers!

nodes.speaker: Dr. Two-Factorious
nodes.text: Next time, turn on MFA… unless you enjoy losing treasure!

nodes.speaker: Dr. Two-Factorious
nodes.text: Story <The Two-Factorious Adventure> complete! Come back when you want even more cyber power!

nodes.speaker: System
nodes.text: (A new article <MFA Learn Guide> is now in your Traveler's journal.)
